clinical_particulars.therapeutic_indications: Under investigation for the treatment of Alzheimer s disease

contraindications.pharmacodynamics: Huperzine B is an alkaloid derived from i Huperzia serrata i which is available as an herbal product in the US It is under investigation as an acetylcholinesterase inhibitor Clinical trials in China have shown that huperzine B is comparably effective to the drugs currently on the market and may even be somewhat safer in terms of side effects
